Orlando.UCF Center for Emerging Media:
The University of Central Florida Center for Emerging Media (CEM) is located in downtown Orlando and is home to a diverse group of teachers, learners and industry professionals collaborating in a creative environment that emphasizes high-production values, cutting-edge technologies and time-tested production techniques.
The Center supports many upper-level undergraduate and graduate programs in film, digital media, video game development, art and architecture.
The facility also features one of the largest motion-capture studios on the East Coast, an adjacent sound stage, production offices and editing suites.
